{
  "name": "{{name}}",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "{{description}}",
  "type": "module",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "vite",
    "build": "tsc && vite build",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "typecheck": "tsc --noEmit",
    "test": "bun test",

    "test:integration": "bun test tests/integration/",

  },

    "react": "^18.2.0",

  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/react": "^18.2.43",

    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^6.14.0",
    "@vitejs/plugin-react": "^4.2.1",

    "@testing-library/jest-dom": "^6.1.5",
    "eslint": "^8.55.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^4.6.0",

    "jsdom": "^23.0.1",
    "prettier": "^3.1.0",

    "vite": "^5.0.8"
  },
  "engines": {
    "bun": ">=1.3.0",
    "node": ">=18.0.0"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "web",
    "react",
    "vite",
    "spa",
    "{{helper:kebabCase name}}"
  ],
  "author": "{{author}}",
  "license": "{{license}}"
}

{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ES2020",
    "useDefineForClassFields": true,

    "strict": {{#if (eq qualityLevel 'strict')}}true{{else}}false{{/if}},

    "noUnusedParameters": {{#if (eq qualityLevel 'strict')}}true{{else}}false{{/if}},
    "noFallthroughCasesInSwitch": true

  "include": ["src"],
  "references": [{ "path": "./tsconfig.node.json" }]
}

## Components

### App Component

The main application component located in `src/App.tsx`.

### Styling

- Global styles in `src/styles/main.css`
- Component-specific styles can be added as CSS modules

### Testing

Tests are written using:
- **Bun** as the test runner
- **React Testing Library** for component testing
- **Jest DOM** for additional DOM matchers

Example test:

```tsx
import { render, screen } from '@testing-library/react';
import App from '../src/App';

test('renders welcome message', () => {
  render(<App />);
  expect(screen.getByText(/Welcome to {{name}}/i)).toBeInTheDocument();
});
```

## Environment Variables

The project supports environment variables with the `VITE_` prefix:

```bash
# App configuration
VITE_APP_TITLE={{helper:pascalCase name}}
VITE_APP_DESCRIPTION={{description}}

# API Configuration
VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:3001/api

# Feature flags
VITE_ENABLE_ANALYTICS=true
VITE_ENABLE_DEBUG=false
```

## Available Scripts

| Script | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| `bun run dev` | Start development server |
| `bun run build` | Build for production |
| `bun run preview` | Preview production build |
| `bun run typecheck` | Run TypeScript compiler |
| `bun test` | Run all tests |
| `bun test:unit` | Run unit tests only |
| `bun test:integration` | Run integration tests only |
| `bun test:coverage` | Run tests with coverage |
| `bun test:watch` | Run tests in watch mode |
| `bun run lint` | Run ESLint |
| `bun run lint:fix` | Fix linting issues automatically |
| `bun run format` | Format code with Prettier |
| `bun run format:check` | Check code formatting |
| `bun run clean` | Clean build artifacts and dependencies |
